content: Finally, there are also certain "friendly" characters you can meet during your adventure who may end up fighting you for various reasons. They are not listed as Yaoguai Chiefs or Kings in your Journal, and aren't "killed" upon defeat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Boss_List_and_Guides.md', within the main section titled 'Boss List and Guides', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Types'.
The content is as follows:
Finally, there are also certain "friendly" characters you can meet during your adventure who may end up fighting you for various reasons. They are not listed as Yaoguai Chiefs or Kings in your Journal, and aren't "killed" upon defeat.
